docs.text: Home EagleRepair is a cross-platform command line tool for automatically fixing static analysis warnigns in C# programs. Documentation : https://marodev.github.io/EagleRepair Install Prerequisites Install .NET 5.0 or later Command line tool EagleRepair is available on NuGet and can be installed as a global tool: dotnet tool install --global EagleRepair.Cli
docs.title: Home
